SEARCH
Package tps.tp4.settlers

Class Settler

java.lang.Object
tps.tp4.settlers.Settler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Settler extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a settler in the colony, with attributes for health, happiness, and impacts.
See Also:
